#summary File Format Specification

= .AHN File Format Specification =

The _Databecker Familienchronik_ family tree software uses a proprietary file format to save it's genealogy data.

The file starts with four magic bytes, followed by datasets, one dataset per person.
 * 0-3: magic

One dataset consist of exactly 1100 bytes each. Some qualifiers are german.
 * 20 bytes: last name, aligned right, padded with spaces (0x20)
 * 20 bytes: last name
 * 20 bytes: first name
 * 20 bytes: first name
 * 10 bytes: spaces (0x20)
 * 10 bytes: birthday, ASCII digits: _DD.MM.YYYY_
 * 30 bytes: town of birth
 * 10 bytes: spaces (0x20)
 * 10 bytes: date of death/marriage?
 * 30 bytes: town of death/marriage?
 * 08 bytes: gender, either _weiblich_ (female) or _m√§nnlich_ (male)
 * 12 bytes: religious denomination, left aligned, padded with spaces, e.g. _evangelisch_ or _katholisch_
 * profession, left aligned, padded with spaces (0x20)
 * ...
